title: Searching / Pierre-François Didot Specimen
content: I question if someone has already had in his possession or seen a serif character specimen that was created by Pierre-François Didot, father of Saint-Léger Didot and uncle of the famous Firmin Didot, probably around 1770 - 1780?
author: Alexis H

comments.content: This doesn't belong in the "Critique" section; I would move it to "General Discussions" and more people will see it.
